name: Thong Nguyen Commune – Nam Hong – Nam Nghi – Phin Ho – Lang Giang
description: From the Centre of Thong Nguyen Commune, You will transfer to Nam Hong Community-based Village via a 3-km road. Nam Hong village is the place for living of 37 Red Dzao households. They are called Chan Pu Bo. You will have a change to see the majestic roads, the terraced fields and enjoy famous Shan Tuyet Tea
